name: Micro Entertainment: Jackpot
description:
This game is part of the Micro Entertainment Pack, a collection of tiny desktop games I developed for fun.

Play a slot machine using virtual chump change! Try to accumulate £16 to win the £50 jackpot! 

Three of a symbol earns the following:

  • Silver Coin - 10p
  • Two Silver Coins - 20p
  • Clubs - 30p
  • Diamonds - 40p
  • Hearts - 50p
  • Spades - 70p
  • Gold Coin - £1
  • Two Gold Coins - £2

Two of a symbol earns half that of three.

Features:

  • Exciting slot machine action - Complete with motivational slogans!
  • A 1 in 4 chance to be able to hold slots - If the hold buttons activate, you can prevent certain slots from moving on your next spin, enabling you to increase the chances of a win.
  • Not actual gambling - You're not wasting any of your hard earned money here, and odds tend to be much more favourable than real slot machines anyway!
  • Virtual Loan Sharks and Pawn Shops - Put your virtual body parts up for collateral or sell your virtual prized possessions to feed your virtual gambling addiction.
  • Tiny, unobtrusive graphics and Micro Mode - The game only occupies a fraction of your screen real estate, and can even be displayed in half size on high DPI displays, making it perfect for discreetly playing at work or while watching something on your computer.

Currently I prioritise mac binaries, as that's the only platform I play these games on, but am also building for other platforms. They are written in Rust and have a dependency on C libraries SDL2 and SDL_gfx.
